item.title: picture too large for the creen
item.description:
hello, my pictures are too large for the sreen, how can i change the size .When i mean too large, that mean i need the mouse to move the picture up and down
http://edouarddeblay.com/

item.title: Koken Site
item.description:
Hello
I have a problem with my koken Site. When i try to load it. In the frontend just the header is rendered, but not the content or the footer. This problem has been going for 2 months now and changing the browser didn't fix it. I hope you can help. Thank you in advance.

item.title: Boulevard Featured Content
item.description:
Hi,
I am very new to Koken. I am following Koken help to make my website. Problem I am facing is with Showing a series of pictures on my home page. I uploaded multiple images to Featured Content Folder and also added an whole album to Featured Album, however only first image appears on my homepage. I need that series with scroll capability. Also is there a way to increase the height of the picture ?
Can someone please assist.
Thank you. Kunal

item.title: Testing and publishing the final Version
item.description:
Hello from Kassel, Germany,
currently we are testing our new website on a different host with a different url. After testing is over and we go to move the installation of the new Koken Site to the final host what happens with the assigning of Madison 2? What has to be changed to let the moved installation work under the final url and host?
Thanks
Stefan

item.title: Koken team, this MUST be changed
item.description:
It is possible to use hidden sets and hidden albums instead of User ID and Password. In Library > Inspector the link is possible to
Copy view and reset
To reset the Site link a double step is needed in the form of “Reset Lite Link really? Yes / No” in order to make no mistakes.
May be, there are better ideas? User ID and Password?
Thank you Franz

item.title: Lightroom Plugin download
item.description:
Hello,
I'm trying to setup integration between lightroom and a a new Koken based website. I've got KOKEn installed and running on my host but I can't find the lightroom plugin download.
I've found this page -> https://store.koken.me/lightroom/koken-publish-service but there doesn't seem to be anywhere to actually download the plugin.
Can you point me in the right direction please?
Thanks

item.title: 3rd party plugins
item.description:
Hi
I am having problems getting 3rd party plugins to work in v0.17.xx of Koken.
Is this by design now, or a bug or a configuration issue at my end? For me extensibility is an absolute must for any cms, and I sincerely hope I will be able to modify and customize some of the workings of Koken to suit my use case.
Regards, Ben

item.title: Display of images in content & Favourites - Madison 2 (Random & Category)
item.description:
I was wondering if there is a way to display the "Content" and "Favourites" pages of images in a random order as it can be done in the slideshow. Similarly, if I want to display a page with my images in a grid of lets say only a particular category "wedding" is that possible?
Thanks.

item.title: Pre-Cache - It is really needed
item.description:
Your system's ability to generate images is really quite slow. I run very fast servers with dedicated RAM and CPU on a dedicated server account,, yet it still takes so long to generate new images that people are leaving thinking the images are broken. I know it is only Koken as my other sites with galleries produce their resized images at a fraction of the speed.
Would it be so hard to simply cache the images with a simple script? All my WordPress websites have this ability. I can cache every page and image on the site with the press of a button.
This is particularly important for gallery sites like these.
Plus it's kinda of ridiculous for me to have to "view" all my uploaded images just to get them cached. It takes a long time to go through and "view" every image each time I upload a new gallery of images.

item.title: Album contains 50 pictures but shows 0
item.description:
What I use : Madison 2 koken 0.17.3 Lightroom 5.6 Koken Publish Service for Adobe Lightroom 1.2.6
I constructed a set containing 2 albums. Than I uploaded 50 pictures from LR to one of this album. After, this album contains definitely 50 pictures, I can see in koken. I can also see, my set contains two albums. But this with my 50 pictures shows 0 (zero). The consequence of this my menu point in my internet site shows "This album is empty".
I hope you can help me. Thank you

item.title: Elementary theme - changing thumbnails to scrolling pics
item.description:
Is there a way to change the album content's thumbnail view into big scrolling pics like on Ensemble theme?
I know I can simply use the Ensemble theme but I like the "Home" page of the Elementary. So it's either I put the "Home" feature on Ensemble or change the album contents' view on Elementary.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: Facebook Like Box
item.description:
Hello
I want to insert the Facebook Like Box into Koken. I had insert the Box wie the HTML Injector plugin in the footer. But i want this in the position of the social network buttons. See screenshot.
http://666kb.com/i/cr9zb7jw6d887s7es.jpg
How can i do this? I dont need two Facebook Like buttons. I think this is interesting for all photographers who has a fanpage on facebook!
I use the Axis 2 Theme

item.title: infinite_toggle not working
item.description:
Hello!
I have trouble making the infinite_toggle work. This is my index.lens code:
https://gist.github.com/martinwolf/d2e440749338d4dbc06e
Is there anything I'm doing wrong? I'm stuck. :/
Cheers, Martin

item.title: Theme-Dev: Tag-Overview as Grid
item.description:
Hi
i worked on my own Theme - based on Blueprint and Axis. At the moment i have an problem to "design" the Tag-Picture-Overview (Blueprint: tag.lens/events.html; own tags.lens).
2 Problems: 1) i want use an Grid-Design - like "Contents layout: GRID" in axix-Theme. Is it possible to "copy" the contents.lens and his *.html-Files an change it to "tag" instead "content"? For an short test, i've do this - it doesn't work ;) i think i forget somethings? Any tips? (i don't want see the title, description of each pic or other available tags for each pic [other tag as option]). Any idea?
2) i don't want links like tags/tag-12/content/this-is-the-content-page-for-image-123 I've checked many themes - but every themes uses as link to the content-Page somethink like tags/tag-12/content/this-is-the-titel-content-page-for-image-123 (or: tags/tag-12/content/this-is-the-titel-content-page-for-image-225). i want use the same link like in contents.lens (/content/this-is-the-titel-content-page-for-image-123).
My code:
tag.lens [short]
layouts/events.html [short]
changed koken:link -> koken:link to="content" ==> /content/:slug/
Regards Patrick
PS: i miss an Theme & Plugin-Board @ help.koken.me :)

item.title: Madison 2 / Timeline
item.description:
Dear Koken Team,
is it somehow possible to show only the latest content upload in timeline? Or in "Content" ?
I know it´s possible to use "Featured Images", but I would like to have something like timeline for latest upload.
Thanks Ming

item.title: FEATURE REQUEST : Set the album's date
item.description:
Hi,
Will it be possible to add an option to set the publication date of an album to the publication date of the oldest picture of this album. It would be an option like the one to set the publication date of a photo to its captured date.
For example, if the oldest picture of my album as been shot at 14h00 the 25th of septembre 2013, the album will be marked as published the same hour and date (13/09/25 14:00:00).
Cheers,
Chris CB

item.title: Photograph not showing as Content?
item.description:
I've just added a photograph ("Brick Buildings In Ann Arbor") to my Koken site (http://www.philperkins.org) and, while the image is appearing in its assigned album (Photography), it isn't showing up as content (Latest Designs)?
Is this a result of an upper limit to the number of images allowable to be displayed as 'content', or some other issue?
Any help is appreciated...

item.title: mapbox.com / implement map / old thread
item.description:
Hi
found this very interesting thread:
http://help.koken.me/customer/portal/questions/8066467-create-a-map-with-all-your-pictures
Added anything as given but get only a blank page (no error message, no http 404)
Could someone help?
Thanks Roland

item.title: Axis-2: After upload double collections get installed in "albums"
item.description: Hi, since same days I have after the upload from photos double collections in the template "album" installed. I do the selection via smart-albums in LR5. In LR5 every thing looks good (only one smart-album with the same name), but on the admin-page and on the website there are double collections installed. And also on the content-page are same photos twice, three-times or even four times present. i already emailed twice, but did not get a response yet. Can anybody help me? Thank you for your help. Heike

item.title: Image size in essay
item.description:
Hello, just in this topic (http://help.koken.me/customer/portal/questions/964279-image-size-2-48px-) I have an issue with the image sizes, and mostly in essays. When adding a photo taking in portrait mode the image cant fit on a normal laptop screen and I cant find a way to make it smaller. I would like it to be maybe half of the screens height. I use the theme Chastain but have seen that the problem is also in the other free themes.
Is this something that can be fixed?

item.title: lightroom pluging JSON error
item.description:
Hello, I have the latest version of koken and lightroom plugin installed (actually I did a clean install to reproduce the problem). I am using the latest version of lightroom available as of 25-08-2014. When I go to Applications and copy the api path into koken account section in lightroom plugin it opens kmy admin interface and allows me to grant access, The token in created and appears in Application section of my koken install.
Then when I click I'm done or whatever it is called in the plug in. I get an error window with:
An internal error has occured: {string "JSON.lua"}:197: nil passed to JSON:decode()
In order to replicate the error I did a clean install of koken, I am still getting the error. I tried both ssl and non ssl address, I get the eror on both (it is a comodo certificate and not a self signed one).
If it is important I am running apache 2.2 php 5.4.24 mysql 5.6.20 on mac osx 10.9.4.
also I tried from local network and from external. (basically tried with 192.168.0.* adress and with my domain name and with my external ip)
Any ideas on how to resolve this^

item.title: Play video file after pre-load
item.description:
Hello,
I added a video to mp4 h264 on my website (http://blogoflip.fr/galeries/albums/timelaps/content/centre-equestre-ocheval/) everything is ok but when I start playing I have to wait for the full load (the video is 400MB) in order to start the drive. Is this normal?
Philippe

item.title: Update fails
item.description: When trying to update my koken-installation (Madison 2) to 0.17.3 the process stops / hangs in the middle and I see "Updating The new version is now being installed." The update never finishes. The website is still working but I can´t get onto the admin-site. I already sent a message to the support team but I got no reply yet. Any ideas what to do? Anybody facing the same problem?

item.title: New Koken user with few questions
item.description:
Hello
First of all a big thank you to all developers, amazing work you are doing!
I'm using the Ensemble theme and have a few questions to modify it: - I would like to have more columns, is there a possibility? - I would like to modify the font+color of the header title, how? - I would like to change the colors of the text, how? - I would like to have the order of the pictures in random, is there a possibility?
How do I set the small image, which you can see on the left of a browser tab (Google Chrome)?
I'm running a homemade Synology NAS, where also the photos are located. Can I link the photos folder directly to Koken? I havent found a "image directory" from Koken yet, so I couldnt do that...
Cheers Josh

item.title: Site links for Content
item.description:
Hi,
I want to create a content page on my site where I show my content based on date uploaded. The default for content is to show based on date published. So to achieve what I want I have to: 1. Add Content page 2. Rename Content page to Content2 3. Press the + sign next to a new Content page and add a new content page with whatever options I want
The new Content page looks fine. My only problem is that the link is content-2 which I don't like. Could you please advise how can I get a custom Content page with "content" in the permalink?
Regards,
Yiannis

item.title: latest Upgrade - admin panel keeps refreshing
item.description:
Hi
After the latest koken update I can't access my admin panel anymore on
After the Upgrade the screen "Updating - The new version is now being installed" is displayed and as soon it's done the pages refreshes and starts again. I then tried to access it with different browsers and deleting the cookies and failed.
Any ideas?
cheers, Stefan

item.title: RSS Feed for Unlisted Gallery
item.description:
Hello,
When I upload my pictures to my Unlisted Gallery I dont want it to be shown on RSS feed. But unfortunatelly every single photo I upload is being shown on recent.rss. How can I stop that?
Thanks,

item.title: Axis 1: no update? (1.4.x to 1.4.3)
item.description:
Hi
i have set for an test the version of Axis 1 to 1.4.1 (actually 1.4.3). But Koken recognized this "older" Version not as old ... No new Updates available. Last Week it works with axis 1.4.x to 1.4.3 (and set 1.4.x again and update)
How can i say koken: newer Version of Axis are available? (Cache cleared, Browser changed, Webserver restart)
Set koken to older Version and update to 0.17.3 works.
Thx Frank

item.title: Information: New plugin for Google+ comments available
item.description: If you are looking for a plugin that allows you to use the Google+ comment system instead of Disqus you can download and install this plugin: https://www.brisoft.de/en/add-google-comments-koken/

Easy Links?

When i go to the Galery, it is the link:
http://www.linsenschuss.de/index.php?/alben/
i think it looks better an its easy for others when the link is shorter. like this:
http://www.linsenschuss.de/alben/
Is this possible?

item.title: www.domainname.com does not work (Docker Issue)
item.description:
Help.. I still can not get www.domainname.com to work. only domainname.com without the www works.. Do I need to make virtual host file in Apache?
Docker is totally different from a normal lamp setup.
Thanks,
-Tyler

item.title: Instagram videos with Instagram plugin for Koken
item.description:
Hi,
I recently bought the Instagram plugin because I need to show some of my Instagram videos on my website. I didn't met any troubles to upload my contents and to create this "automatic album".
I can't upload these videos on Vimeo. I have already this another plugin for other movies. It's perfection !
Is there a next step for your Instagram plugin concerning the integration of videos ?
Thanks you, Nicolas

item.title: Bug: Publish live for essay
item.description:
So I saved an essay as draft, then I published it as live (same screen). But it didn't seem to work (refreshed but still not seeing it). Set as Featured (hoping it'll make it to the main Essay page - I'm using Boulevard theme) and still nothing.
Then I don't know what I did, but I eventually saw the "Publish live" on the button again (as oppsoed to save changes). It might be possbile that if you click it once, it publishes and if you click again, it doesn't (goes back to draft).

item.title: Plugin : Like option
item.description:
Hello,
Do you plan to develop a plugin "Like button" type of facebook?

item.title: admin login after installation fails "incorrect e-mail" && reset fails with "that e-mail address..."
item.description:
admin login after installation fails "incorrect e-mail" && reset attempt fails with "that e-mail address is unknown".
Site: http://koken.daerr.com
Steps taken:
Install on clean sub-domain Installation ended OK. (config was done with copy and pasting credentials from a side-document to avoid typos in e-mail etc.)
Error description At admin login after install, the login fails "incorrect e-mail" Trying to use reset on the admin page fails with "that e-mail address is unknown".
-> Trying to use procedure http://help.koken.me/customer/portal/articles/1182607-recovering-a-lost-password fails with "server denying to display page", even after checking chmod status of the 'password-reset.php' file.
Help & advice appreciated.

item.title: After changing URL picture are not displayed anymore
item.description:
I have installed Koken in a sub folder for testing reason. After I was convinced that Koken is excatly what I'm looking for. So, I wanted to moved the site from mydomain.de/koken to mynewdomain.de - both are on the same server. Based on the tips I found here, I was able to do so, but now the pic which I added from flickr so far are gone. In the content overview I can see all files but the pic are not displayed. Instead of that I see this rotating circle for each pic. And even when I want to add a pic it will not displayed. I used GD bundles which was obviously working fine under mydomain.de/koken.
What can I do to use koken under the new domain in the old folder?
Thanks in advance.

item.title: [Axis2] - submenu in navigation?
item.description:
Hi
Is its possible to make some submenus in the navigation?
Screenshot from my old page for exaple: http://666kb.com/i/cr6o7i4yapwr5y3is.jpg
It would be really great if you could implement the submenu!
Thank you

item.title: Images won't load, or take forever to load
item.description:
I have some images that just refuse to load, for example here:
http://www.tobiassolem.se/albums/rynningeviken/
For whatever reason 1-2 tops 4 images load, and then the rest take forever to load.
256MB cache RAM and cache enabled.
Please help.
Thank you.
/Tobias

item.title: "Share-buttons": what file do they come from?
item.description:
Hi,
I like the share buttons, however, I don't want to have all of them but only some. As that can not be configured, I figure it should be easy to get rid of some in their source file. But which one would that be?
Any one any idea?
Thanks and have a nice weekend!
Jan

item.title: Ads in Koken
item.description:
Hello,
i wan't to include ads in my Koken Blog. Is there someting like replacing every 10th picture in albums with some Ad?
thanks

OSX 10.9.4 LR 5.6 Plugin version - 1.2.6 Koken version - 0.17.3

In the Library page the albums are still there but in the site page, no albums found

Philippe

Not Found
The requested URL /koken/admin/ was not found on this server.
via FTP I have controled the presense of this folder. This folder has been created on my webserver One.com.
How resove this?

item.title: Get images and the titles of the set and album they are in
item.description:
Heyhey,
is there a way to achieve this?
Backend structure: set (a) -> album (b) -> image (c)
with all featured images (or images with a specific tag)
(c)
Title of Album the image is in (b)
Title of Set the Album is in (a)
Help would be really appreciated. Thanks! Martin

item.title: [Axis] Number of Columns & Pulse
item.description:
Helle There,
i have two questions.
1. I cant find the config to change the number of the columns anymore in Axis. On one website i have 3 columns on another i have 4 columns. I want to have 3 columns on both :)
2 secons question is about pulse. In my albums i want to see first the grid layout and than, when click on a pucture, a slideshow. Is this possible ?
Thanks for your help
Nicole

item.title: image protector reinstalling does not work
item.description:
hello
some time ago I bought the expansion image protector. Unfortunately I had to put on my new website, and now wants to image protector install again. but that does not work, only the window with "install the plugin" opens and then I'm stuck. about the website I tried the reinstall the product, but that has not helped. can someone help me?
please excuse my bad english
Thank you, Denis

item.title: Accessing a Subdirectory on my web server
item.description:
My host lets me look at my stats by going to domain.com/stats/
Since Koken is installed in /koken and I'm using an .htaccess file to redirect, how can I go to /stats/?
I get a 404 error.
Thanks, Tom

item.title: Changing the order of albums in a set
item.description: How do I do this? I am sure I have done it before but I can't see now.....

item.title: LR upload failed (assertion failed) since 0.17.x
item.description:
Hi, since upgraded to koken .17.3 I cannot upload any images anymore. I have LR 5.4 and added some smart and regular albums, filled with one or more images. Koken creates an album, but it takes minutes to upload them.
Sometimes I get an "assertion failed" error, sometimes the job just finishes, but there no new images online.
Console-Log: 21.08.14 20:04:11,863 Adobe Photoshop Lightroom 5[1861]: Failed to restore first responder (message was inputContext)
I appreciate any help!! Sebastian

item.title: Pulse Pager
item.description:
Hey guys,
I wonder if there is a way to easily add a pager to a Pulse slideshow. Something like that: http://drop.horrido.io/aqMpuQDW0.png
Thought maybe there is something implemented because it's a relatively common pattern.
Thank you! Martin

item.title: Pulse with Captions
item.description:
Hey guys,
I'm currently doing my first project with Koken for a client and I like it so far. What I need to do now is the following:
My structure is like that: - set -- album --- images -- album --- images - set -- album --- images - set -- album --- images
Now I need to add a slideshow on the index page with featured content images which are selected from the albums. In the pulse slideshow I need to have the featured image with a caption consisting of the set and the album name the image is in.
Is there a way to do that?
Help would be greatly appreciated!
Thank you! Martin

Chris

item.title: Album title/Set title - Madison 2 theme
item.description:
Is it possible to remove title from a Set page - but keep title on Album page?
I see that I can uncheck 'Show album title and description' - but this removes title from Set page and Album page.
Reason: I have a link for each Set, the link is highlighted to indicate the title, so I'd prefer not to show the title of the Set page. But when I open the Set, I'd like to have Album titles showing.
Many thanks

item.title: LR Plugin does not work (LR 4.4, koken plugin 1.2.6) koken ver 0.17.3
item.description:
hi! installation seemed to be ok, but when i tried to upload my pics through LR this warning occoured:
an internal problem showed up : KokenAPI.lua:304: attempt to index local 'settings' (a boolean value)
i then changed my internet connection, tried it again and got another failure (seen also in the error report):
Plug-in error log for plug-in at: /Users/gerhardkrejci/Downloads/koken-publish-service 2/koken.lrplugin
**** Error 1
Die Nachbearbeitungsaufgabe dieses Zusatzmoduls konnte nicht erfolgreich abgeschlossen werden. KokenAPI.lua:304: attempt to index local 'settings' (a boolean value)
**** Error 2
Die Nachbearbeitungsaufgabe dieses Zusatzmoduls konnte nicht erfolgreich abgeschlossen werden. AgExportSession:recordRemoteCollectionId: remote ID must be a number or string
could you help me please? gerhard

Hello

Thanks

item.title: GIF animation
item.description:
When I upload a gif it only shows as a static image - what can I do?
My settings are:
Image publishing Processing: GD bundled (2.1.0 compatible) HiDPI (Retina): Publish high resolution images Quality / Sharpness: Use default settings
System PHP: Version 5.3.29 MySQL: Version 5.5.38-MariaDB-1~wheezy Server operating system: Linux Image processing: GD bundled (2.1.0 compatible) FFmpeg: Not installed Memory limit: 128MB Upload file size limit: 96MB EXIF/IPTC parsing: Supported
the best, Tove

item.title: KOKEN 0.17.3 Update
item.description:
Update from 0.17.2 to 0.17.3 started normally and hungs in the middle. After several hours I closed my Browser because nothings happens.
Now the following problem appeared - after I login console switched directly to Update Screen and thats all. Not able to do something in KOKEN Console.
What can I do?

item.title: Axis-2 home page resizing bug
item.description:
Hi , again small bug ,
even on http://axis.koken.me/
if you resize browser window manually - it looks ok ,
but if click expand/collapse button ( Restore down) next to X - homepage slideshow do not catch that event and do not resize slideshow
( checked on chrome)

item.title: viewing images sequentially
item.description:
Hello,
i'm new to koken. The management on the back end is really cool, but browsing the photos in the front end are not so good in my opinion. I mean, i want to browse through the thumbs in an album, and by clicking a thumb i want to go directly to a big view of this photo with the feature to move to the next/previous photo (like the lightbox), but without the step between to see a content-page of this single photo. Closing the lightbox should navigate me back to my thumbs inside the album. Also, is there an alternative to the lightbox? What lightbox makes me crazy is, i cannot zoom in to a photo, and browsing to the next photo hides the lightbox while loading the photo (in InternetExplorer), so user can think the box has closed. The next thing is, if i close the lightbox, i'm in the content page of a photo. Now i click to the browsers back button. I expect to get back to the thumbs of the album, but instead the lightbox is shown again. So the navigation is very annoying to me. Are there settings or other possibilities to customize the users browsing experience.
Thank you

item.title: Madison2 and IE9 - Thanks and some advice
item.description:
Hi,
I've installed the IE9 update for madison 2 and everything on my end looks great. Unfortunately, it seems that our public service departments don't allow webfonts.
The problem with that is the page up and down arrows fall back to a Chinese(?) character font and the slideshow doesn't have all the controls available. The right arrow is appearing but the rest of the controls are missing.
Any advice on what I need to change in order to fix those up?
On my end, with IE9, everything looks great!
I'd also like to say a big thank you to the guys working on Koken. Not one week after asking about the IE9 issues and they've come out with an update. I appreciate it, thanks!.

item.title: Vimeo AutoPlay and Description wont turn off
item.description: Hi, I'm trying to turn off the autoplay and descriptions for the Vimeo video plug-in. I clicked off the "autoplay video" under the Vimeo player tab in the inspector but there is no option to save that change. Whenever I click back onto the video the "autoplay" is still selected. Is their any solutions? Thanks. :)

item.title: Timeline
item.description:
Hello
I would like to exclude in the timeline some albums / sets. How can this be done?
And can I limit the timeline to a number? The are listed as only a maximum of 12?

item.title: Speed
item.description: I have been using Koken for about a year now for my website and in the last few weeks it has been running SUPER slow. I updated the software (I am using Repetoire) and it has not helped. Did something change in the last few weeks? I can barely do anything, the images take forever to load.

item.title: Axis-2 Video bug
item.description:
another bug with video positioning
video is self hosted
lightbox disabled
i.e. just clicked from content and start playing ( i.e. before starting playing it looks ok )
there is black line on top and player is not at the bottom - so looks like something wrong with player/video positioning
screenshot :
http://www.tiikoni.com/tis/view/?id=8060127
( another bug btw with video when lightbox is enabled - clicking video from content - it shows video in lightbox - but clicking don't play it - it ok to just show video as just fisrt frame if it is not possible to play it properly in lightbox - but than play button need to be disabled at least some how )

Hi ,

item.title: albums not displaying on albums page
item.description:
Hi It seems as though after a recent koken update; my albums that I have set up in Library are not displaying when clicking on the albums page. It says "No albums; please create albums in Library"
Any quick fixes? Even if I create another test album; it doesn't display Am I missing something?
Kind Regards

item.title: Date translate
item.description: How can I change the language of the dates displayed on the site? When I edit the file ./system/language/english/calendar_lang.php, everything is still in English. I try clean cache.

item.title: Pulse slideshow to load first
item.description:
Hello,
We are designing our own theme. We have a Album-page with first a Pulse slideshow of the album (covering most of the screen) and beneath that the thumbs of the same album (of course) for a quick overview. However the thumbs (that are mostly not visible) load first. When loading of all thumbs (often 100+) has completed the Pulse slideshow starts to initialize. So one is looking to a black screen often for 10s or more. And when one scrolls down to see if anything is happening we get an '500 Internal Server Error'. Have a look here (not yet public): http://www.alphenphoto.nl/koken/index.php?/categories/psvjeugd/albums/psv-b1-alphense-boys-b1-5-1/
Our questions: - We have tried hard (f.i. 'lazy loading' the thumbs giving us the same '500 Internal Server Error' on scrolling down) but can not get the Pulse slideshow to load first - can someone help us out with that? - How can we avoid the '500 Internal Server Error' without having to give up the Pulse slideshow on the same page (we suspect that might cause the problem)?
As always, thanks for the good work, really appreciate it.
Kind regards, Ron Hoenson alphenphoto.nl

item.title: Dynamic shifting of the whole Boulevard theme?
item.description:
Hi! I'm using Boulevard NOT for what it was intended, but it works fine for me although I am OF COURSE stuck with one little problem... I'd like the whole thing to be dynamically centered in the browser, but I can't find how I could do it. Any HTML / CSS geniuses out there that can help me?
For a peak at what I mean, go check my website and you'll undertand...
http://www.jscote.com
Thanks a lot!
Cheers!
JS

item.title: Plugins: "require file.php" not allowed?
item.description:
Hi
i want to integrate the "commentics"-Comment-System into Koken. I want use the "disqus"-Plugin from Koken as basis.
I don't need Setup ... so i change $this->require_setup = true; ... to false.
I need only "$this->register_hook('discussion', 'render_div');" ... (in my theme i activated disqus-comments)
In function render_div()
$cmtx_identifier = '1'; $cmtx_reference = 'Page One'; $cmtx_path = '/apps/koken/commentics/upload/'; require $cmtx_path . 'includes/commentics.php';
path are correct
I think "require" is forbidden by Koken?
When I open an content-site: parsing stopped at this
Change require to include => parsing is correct, but NO content in kdiscuss-DIV.
Commentics need to run an session_start(); in Line 1 of my php-code ... insert this into site.php (Line 1) - don't work.
Is there a way to run this code in an koken-plugin?
For testing I use "require '/robots.txt';" ... don't work...
Thanks

Any ideas on what could be happening here?

item.title: Scrolling images in Elementary
item.description:
I am using the Elementary theme. I forget what I did to create the page, but one page on my site has large images that scroll vertically with the mouse wheel. I like this layout. My other pages all have grids of thumbnails. In the right side control panels, the "template" section says no template data for that page. All the other pages have both theme and template data.
How can I make more pages with large images that scroll, either vertically or horizontally? Thanks.

item.title: problem downloading koken
item.description: what do i do if download says error and will not open.My computer is windows 2008 but doesn't have PFP in it.

item.title: Update never completing
item.description:
Hi,
My admin panel is inaccessible due the latest update never completing. No error is returned. I think it might have occurred because the update firstly asked me to set all folders permission to 777, and WHILE filezilla was setting the permissions, koken retried to update.
Any ideas? Denis.

item.title: fresh install to stop 777 issues
item.description:
would a clean install stop the 777 probs every update since 14.0 ? i have two installs on the same host (streamline.net) old site updates fine, new one won't so i move the files over via ftp.
if i do a clean install and then ftp the storage folders and database back, would it work ?
i dont think i can point to the current database during setup can i ?
thanks

item.title: More 0.17.2 problems - internal server error on cached images
item.description:
My Koken install was working dandy until the update to 0.17.2. The first issue I noticed was the content.tags lens tag is now blank, which in this case is serious as we're using tags to define the display of different types of images.
Another problem has arisen however, wherein certain images are throwing a 500 Internal Server Error in Lightbox view. It's unclear why some do and some don't, but when I examine the cache folder via FTP I can see that the problem images have a suffix of '.lock'.
This wasn't happening before - and we need to get the site back in action ASAP. Can you help?

item.description:

my website www.kimthome.com/koken
2) Is there a way of centering my text content under "ABOUT" (from pages)
All help is appreciated!
Kim

item.title: password-protected albums
item.description:
Hello everybody,
a week ago I installed Koken the first time and I'm very pleased about the functionality and performance so far.
But now I was asked by a customer to, if it is possible to created a password-protected album at my site with the pics of his order.
Is this currently possible with Koken? And if not, will that be possible in the future?
Best regards
René

item.title: Instagram Plugin doesn't seem to work
item.description:
I just bought the Instragram import Plugin and tried to import some of my Photos. I tried both ways, selecting the images visually for import and providing individual URLs. But both ways don't work at all. For the visual selection and import Koken just sits there and spins forever pretending to import something. But it never does actually. For single URLs I get an exclamation mark message with "true". But no image is actually imported.
Any idea where I can look for the cause of this one?

item.title: Koken Site Blown Up after Update on 0.17.2
item.description:
Hi Team,
During update to 0.17.2 I recieved the error for none sufficient permissions. Afterwards the whole installation seems to be messed up. Not possible to access the site anymore.
Support is much appreciated! FTP access can be given via Email.
Thanks,
Josef

item.title: Wrong linking in Disqus comments
item.description:
Hi,
I'm not sure if this is related to Koken or Disqus or both but comments that appear under the page as "Also on yourwebsite.url" may have some wrong url address.
for example http://nitrogliserin.net/essays/2014/06/italy-the-red-passion/ here under the page you'll see two comments.
Left comment is linking to koken.nitrogliserin.net which is not a valid url and after you click it it won't open.
Right comment has a valid url and can be opened.
I don't know where it does get this wrong linking.
I'll be glad you can support me on this.
Regards,

item.description:

item.title: Beta
item.description:
Hello,
Softaculous does not yet support Koke, because they mention it's still in beta, is it true ? Softaculous discussion takes place here where they mention the above http://www.softaculous.com/board/index.php?tid=4267&title=Koken

item.title: UniqueID issues and updates
item.description:
Hello Koken Team,
with every update I need to merge my installation with your update because you haven't fixed all unique id occurences (e.g. in Email.php, Upload.php, ...).
As you may remember there is a problem with the unique id in IIS where you need to extend the randomizer. It would be great if I could upgrade my installation without any merge operations afterwards.
Thank you!
kind regards Marco

item.title: suggested improvements to lightbox
item.description:
I'm using the Regale 2 theme. I've search the web and discussions on koken.me for any advice on creating a link from the currently displaying lightbox image to the actual image content page, but I can't find anything. I'd like visitors to be able to go directly from an image they see in the lightbox to the webpage for that image so they can comment or share if they so desire. This is probably possible by getting into the core of Koken, but I'm hoping to work around it with javascript so I can continue to receive future upgrades. My first suggestion would be to add this functionality.
Less import, I've also found there to be no way to configure speed or transitions for lightbox slideshows, only for the splash page sildeshow or slideshows embedded in essays. Is that something you could add? I'm not liking how abruptly the images transition in the lightbox.
Lastly, I've read that it's not possible to create a lightbox slideshow for a specific album. I just put up my website and so far it doesn't have a lot of content, but I'll definitely want the visitors to be able to peruse, in a slideshow, only the contents of the album they are in. Can that feature be added in the future or do you have a suggestion for a workaround?
Thank you.

item.title: Pulse window has no options
item.description: Whenever I go to Site and click the icon to get the dropdown list with options for Pulse appear, it's always empty. No settings at all. How can I make the options appear or set the transition type through code instead?
